title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 810.2 - Applicability
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12 ยง 810.2 - Applicability

State Regulations

The regulations of this Part apply to grants under section
886
of the Labor Law
to provide occupational safety and health education and training
services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 12
ยง
810.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
